Text: *sigh*

(Looks like the Oriana Kingdom lacks a successor.
There's a rift between the emerging group called the
Perv Faction and the conservative force opposing
them—the anti-Perv Faction.)
Morning, Cid.

(Factional disputes, war... Stuff like this just has
a kind of romance to it.)

(These kinds of scenarios always have an opening or
two for a shadowbroker to burst onto the scene and
strut his stuff.)
Here you go.
I'll have your breakfast ready soon.
(So, they've yet to prepare the next ruler...)
Maybe I should help.
Hehe. Thank you. But you really don't need to.

(After the king's death, the Oriana Kingdom is
engulfed in factional strife. A mysterious figure
emerges, leading the new ruler to restore stability.)

(The unknown eminence lurking in the shadows of
history...)
(Nice. Real nice. Talk about a fixer role.)

(If Oriana needs a new ruler, someone like Rose would
be perfect...)
(Come to think of it, why did she off her dad again?)

(Was she really that upset about being engaged to
Perv...?)

(No, that's not it. I remember she had a determined
look in her eyes.)
Will you believe in me, no matter what may come?

(To become the ruler, she was even ready to kill
her father... A path paved in blood, a choice for
ultimate power. Why shouldn't I believe in her?)

(As a side character, as a shadowbroker, I'll support
Rose becoming the ruler.)

(Once she becomes the supreme ruler, she'll
eventually confront the protagonist.)

(But someone will intervene between the two of them.
A shadowbroker with ties to the ruler.)

(And that individual will be someone she once shared
her dreams with!)
I like it. A real recipe for success.
Alright, alright. I'll bring you another serving.
(Now that's decided, I should start preparing—)
Just then, the door opens.
Three uncouth soldiers enter.
Collection time!

We give all upstanding citizens the right to support
the kingdom's army!
Hey missy, where do you keep your safe?
Th-That's not fair! I just gave you all the money I—

Well, what'd you know? There's still quite a bit
left.
That's the operating funds for my tavern...!
Oh, and you'll be donating this barrel as well.
Looks like it's time to get back to my roots.
Wait, that's the last of my alcohol...!
Shaddup...
You can pay us with your body if you'd like.
Hey, save some for me, too.
W-W-W-Wait!
Huh?
L-L-L-Leave Marie...
...a-a-a-alone!

(It's that setup where the power of love inspires a
boy to take on a group of soldiers—)
(And fails miserably.)
Well, ain't that something.
Oh, to be young again.
Let's drink to that!
Cid! Don't be so reckless!
Agh... Sorry.
They took...all your money.

It's fine. I used to work as a prostitute in the
Lawless City.
Violent customers were just a fact of life there...

I came this close to giving up more times than I can
count... But I never did...

And because of that, I was there when he showed up
and saved me.
And now you've saved me as well.
Well, I gotta get going.

Are you sure? Why not wait until your injuries
heal?

I've got things I need to do. Oh, about my room
fee...
Don't worry about it. It's my way of thanking you.
...Cool, cool. See you around then.
Yes.
I hope to see you again...

(He makes a grand entrance, shows off, and then
vanishes in style...)
(Whoever this guy is, he gets it...)
(I can't let him outdo me...!)
